file_content.text: Fantastic work! Truly amazing!
The governor is waiting!
I'd like to speak with Governor Saresh.
Ah, I'll be happy to arrange that for you. She's very eager to speak with you!
Her office is right here in the settlement--feel free to stop by anytime.
Hold a moment, please. Strom?
Scanning... ID confirmed. This is the guy.
Scanning... confirmed. It's her, all right.
Welcome to Taris, Master Jedi. Apologies for the delay, but Governor Saresh requests your help with some... security issues on the reconstruction project.
If there's anything I can do to help protect your people, I'll do it.
Of course.
You wouldn't need a Jedi's assistance for a simple security matter.
You're holding something back.
I wouldn't call this one "simple."
No need for Jedi.
You know, Jedi aren't the only ones who can solve a little security problem....
Interested in extra help?
Good to meet you, Lieutenant. We've got some... security concerns with the reconstruction project, and Governor Saresh hopes you and your team can help.
My team already has a priority assignment.
I'm on a mission.
Sure--you wouldn't be here otherwise. But this is a serious situation.
You know, the military isn't the only place to find skilled, enterprising individuals....
Interested in extra help?
The governor is... aware of your reputation as well, Captain. She would actually welcome your assistance, if you're available.
Captain. Governor Saresh is... concerned about the reconstruction project's security. She's aware of your reputation and hopes you're available.
If the people of this settlement are in danger, let me help protect them.
I could lend a hand.
We'd be honored to have your help, Master Jedi.
I sense this is more than a simple security matter.
You're holding something back.
Yeah, I think you could say that.
Havoc Squad can handle any problems you're having, sir.
Don't bother contracting out.
Wow. Well, we definitely won't say "no" to Havoc Squad.
I'm always available to a governor... if the price is right.
Depends on the pay.
The governor is prepared to be very generous.
Is Governor Saresh the official in charge here?
Governor Saresh?
Yep. "Duly appointed Senatorial Supervisory Governor for Planetary Affairs," if you're feeling long-winded.
No thanks.
Please--hear us out. It's very important.
Taris is substantially more... hazardous than initial reports had suggested. The specifics aren't common knowledge offworld, but....
...But we're trying to rebuild a planet covered with toxic junk and diseased, carnivorous monsters, and it ain't working.
Ahem. Governor Saresh has plans to alleviate some of these issues, but they require highly skilled individuals to carry out. Individuals like you.
I'll be glad to pitch in.
You can count on me.
Terrific! The governor will want to go over the plans with you in detail--I'll let her know to expect you right away.
Your help will make a big difference to the people here. Thanks.
Good luck!
How does the governor plan on dealing with this, exactly?
What does she have in mind?
She'll be happy to discuss the details with you in person. I'll let her know you'll be stopping by.
Just hear her out--you can make a huge difference here.
Thank you for your time!
I'm sure you and the governor can find someone else.
Count me out. [Refuse quest]
Blast it....
Can't talk now, sorry!
